aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-3226-925 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 25/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 28/03/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 26/03/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 30/03/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 01/04/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
